Learning-outcomes.item: Demonstrate understanding of the fundamental concepts of data communications.
Understand signals and signal encoding methods to communications and data transmission modes.
Describe, compare and contrast the five (TCP/IP) or seven layers (OSI) models of networking and their functionalities.
Explain an implement application layer protocols in a high level language such as C/C++ or Java.
Explain the basic concepts of reliable transport.
Explain the basic concepts of the network, link and physical layers and be able to configure routers, switches, hubs and repeaters.
Design and build a network application including client-server and peer-to-peer.
Setup networking specific software such as Routing tables, DNS, Mail servers, DHCP, and wireless network
Describe emerging technologies in the net-centric computing area and assess their current capabilities, limitations, and near-term potential.
